Detailed Description

A generic robot class that specifies general required functions for basic robot operation.

Richard Edwards

Member Function Documentation

Abstract function for connecting to the robot.

Implemented in Scribbler.

Abstract function for disconnecting from the robot.

virtual void Robot::move ( double  translate,
double  rotate,
double  z = 0 
) [pure virtual]

Abstract function for moving a robot with some tranlation velocity, rotational velocity, and possibly some z-dimension velocity.

Implemented in Scribbler.

virtual void Robot::translate ( double  val  )  [pure virtual]

Abstract function for issuing a translational velocity.

Implemented in Scribbler.

virtual void Robot::rotate ( double  val  )  [pure virtual]

Abstract function for issuing a rotational velocity.

Implemented in Scribbler.

void Robot::motors ( double  leftSpeed,
double  rightSpeed 
)

Definites a default behavior for issuing speeds to the left and right motor. However, it requires that your class has implemented the move function.

void Robot::turnLeft ( double  speed,
double  time = 0 
)

A default behavior for turning the robot left for either some specified amount of time, or to be executed until another command is sent.

void Robot::turnRight ( double  speed,
double  time = 0 
)

A default behavior for turning the robot right for either some specified amount of time, or to be executed until another command is sent.

void Robot::turn ( double  direction,
double  time = 0 
)

A default turn function for telling the robot to turn left or right at a preset speed, for some amount of time or until another command is issued.

void Robot::turn ( std::string  direction,
double  value,
double  time = 0 
)

A default turn function for telling the robot to turn left or right at a specified speed, for some amount of time or until another command is issued.

void Robot::forward ( double  speed,
double  time = 0 
)

A default function for telling the robot to move foward at a specified speed and for some duration of time, or until another command is sent.

void Robot::backward ( double  speed,
double  time = 0 
)

A default function for telling the robot to move in reverse at a specified speed and for some duration of time, or until another command is sent.
